text: @Politidope @Scaramucci Arguably the most irresponsible act of an elected official in our lifetime, Trump waived off months of harrowing intelligence briefings and publicly and privately played coronavirus down. We could be South Korea (232 deaths) rather than 70,000 US deaths - and $4 Trillion
